      • isBlacklistName

        public static boolean isBlacklistName(String name)
        Is this name in our blacklist? If not a blacklist, call isValidName and return true if it is an invalid name.
        Parameters:
        name - - Name to be checked for invalidity.
        Returns:
        true if this name is blacklist/invalid
